Alright, let's confirm the flow of the unit live.
First, let's start with the MC, and let's use it as a practice too.

─...Thanks to everyone,
I've been able to come this far.

No matter how many times I say thank you, it's not enough.
So, from now on... please let me continue to express my gratitude.
Thank you very much...!

Chiyuki-san, that was amazing...!
Amana, my heart was pounding so hard...!
Yeah... Yeah...!

Even though it's just practice, there's something
overwhelming about listening to it. You're amazing.

─... Tenka... is still...
not really... an idol yet...

...There are... lots of fun things... outside of...
my futon... That's why... I want to do my best...

S-So... So... um... Tenka...
will... work even harder...!
Tenka-chan...!

Yeah... maybe... that feeling...
will definitely come across.
Ah, I'm looking forward to the actual performance now.

─You know, it's still kinda strange to
think of Amana as an idol even now.

At first, it was just for fun, but...
before I knew it, she was really serious about it...

(Just as I thought...
Amana's position is...)

─Amana, you know... right now, I'm really happy.
So, hope that... from now on too...

Forever, just like this...
hope nothing changes...

─...So, um... from now on too...
please continue to support us!!
